title: Circle Animation
desc:
A full stack application wherein you hit the notes that are moving in accordance to the rhythm of the song.

It uses React for the frontend, Node and Express for the backend, as well as MongoDB for its database.

title: NextAni Database
desc:
A simple anime database created using Next.js.

It fetches data from Anilist.co's API.

title: Video Trimmer
desc:
A script-based video trimmer using FFmpeg, mpv, and Node.js.

Trim one or more segments from a video that you like and merge each one at the end. All you need to do is to save the filename and all the timestamps which you would like to be trimmed inside a text file and let the program handle the rest.

title: Javascript Calculator
desc:
A simple javascript calculator. It uses math.js library to parse the expressions and to give proper error messages.

Aside from the four basic operations, it would also prevent the user from doing any wrong inputs.

title: Markdown Previewer
desc:
If you are looking for a place to test your markdown skills, then try to put your code in here. You could also hide the editor if you want when reviewing your output.

It uses marked.js to parse and compile your markdown input.

title: Drum Machine
desc:
A drum machine with 9 different inputs you can choose from. You could also see the name of each input upon activating it.

Feel free to change the volume if you ever find the sound to be too loud.
